content: I do not have personal preferences, likes or dislikes. however, i can tell you that there have been many memorable oscar moments over the years. from emotional acceptance speeches to unexpected wins, hilarious hosting moments and iconic fashion statements, the oscar ceremony is always full of excitement and entertainment. some of the most memorable oscar moments include halle berry’s emotional acceptance speech, when she became the first african american woman to win best actress in a leading role, the famous "moonlight - la la land" mix-up in 2017 and when a streaker ran across the stage during david niven’s opening monologue in 1974.
